name: UserNotFound
description:
UserNotFound is a 2-player online physics puzzle game (singleplayer is also available).

Using unique physics and lasers, work with the other player to solve puzzles and reconnect a broken and glitchy network. With inspiration taken from games like Portal and Superliminal, UserNotFound explores players' use of novel game physics and non-verbal communication when solving problems.

This game was made as a collaboration between students at USC Games and Berklee College of Music.
